value:
Focus, Ingrid. A knight doesn't stop
in the middle of training just because
of hunger pangs.

Getting dolled up never appealed
much to me. Instead, I choose to
prioritize my pursuits as a knight.

Someone handed me a bowl of fried
noodles. Did I look desperate? Well, I
suppose they're mine now!

I borrowed a book from Askr's library
before coming here. It's a pleasure
to read while listening to the waves.

I hope Sylvain isn't skirt chasing and
causing trouble... Who am I kidding?
Of course he is.

Hello, I am Ingrid Brandl Galatea.
I bring tidings and good food from
your friend, $Nf.
Hard work always pays off.
Can't let this heat get the best of me.

I'd like to blame this on the relaxing
atmosphere, but it's just my own lack
of preparation.

One step closer to becoming a
worthy knight.

My name is Ingrid Brandl Galatea.
I aim to become a gallant and noble
knight. No sunny beach will distract me.

What a splendid beach! Fresh
seafood, fruit, and ice cream. I
can't say no to good food.$k$pIt's a stark contrast to that of Galatea,
my home territory, where its citizens
are no strangers to famine.$k$pNow I feel guilty feasting on such
luxury while my people continue to
suffer... Is this really OK?$k$pOh, you're saying I shouldn't worry
so much right now? I understand.
Thank you, $Nu.$k$pI'll use this time to gather my strength
and focus on the prosperous future I
hope to make a reality for Galatea.
(exertion)
Sink!
(exertion)
That's cold!
You're going under!
Behave yourself!
It's only water!
Cool off!
I've actually got plans...
Hehe
I'm Ingrid. Ready for a fun day at the beach?
The water's bracing today! Oh, refreshments? Don't mind if I do!
I understand the need for swimwear, but I much prefer my academy attire.
Swimming is a great way to keep your whole body in fighting shape.
My friends are always causing trouble. It's hard for me to completely relax.
I love swimming and sunbathing, but...when do we eat?
Looks like you've gotten a bit of sun. Come on, let's take a break in the shade for a while.
Let's make waves.
Going with the flow.
Like a fish to water.
